comment: : Anyone with photos or videos from today's shootings, send to at this link
amr:
# ::snt : Anyone with photos or videos from today's shootings, send to at this link
(s / send-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (a / anyone
            :ARG0-of (h / have-03
                  :ARG1 (o / or
                        :op1 (p / photograph-01)
                        :op2 (v / video)
                        :source (s2 / shoot-02
                              :time (t / today)))))
      :ARG2 (l / link
            :mod (t2 / this)))
